explains: adj. 有高风险的；高危的

sentences.en: They are considered a high-risk group.
sentences.cn: 他们被视为高风险群体。

sentences.en: The invisible group wasn't far behind the high-risk set, with more than 13% of them exhibiting depression.
sentences.cn: 看不见的那组在高风险组后面不远，其中超过13%的人表现出抑郁症状。

sentences.en: These workers are considered (as) a high-risk group.
sentences.cn: 这些工人被视为属高风险人群。
